description:
Now, it works on the TouchPad!

Welcome to Crimson Fields, the highly anticipated & FREE strategical war game for your Palm Pre.

Slip into the role of the rebels from Nexus or defend the Empire of Kand: This game is very addictive. 

Gameplay: Move the map with your finger. Tap a unit and command it to another place on the map. Attack enemies within range.

Use the backswipe to cancel a unit selection or pop up the game menu. Use the @ key on your keyboard to pop up the context menu (unit menu, building menu). Additionally, you can move the selection or units with keys G,R,D and C.

Enjoy this outstanding game!
